_header: No wonder thou I mourning make
Note: See burden alone 452; see also 636 and 451
_description: Sore I sigh — seven quatrains with refrain, ‘alone I lyue alone’ and 2-line burden: ‘Alone I lyue alone / And sore I sighe for one’
